amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt rules pertaining to veterans from the provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 12 printed in Part B of House Report 113-187 to exempt rules pertaining to veterans from the additional requirements of the Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 226 (Roll no. 443).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 226 (Roll no. 443).

Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Moore.
